name: Arcsmith
summary:
BECOME AN ARCSMITH Assemble essential items of the future using a library of modular pieces with master arcsmith Korith Dinn as your reluctant mentor. Watch your quiet station become the focal point of an intergalactic power struggle that could determine the future of the universe.

A NEW TYPE OF VR EXPERIENCE Solve challenging three-dimensional engineering puzzles. Balance heat, power and other variables along the way and use diagnostic tools to guide your creations.

LEARN ON THE JOB Get the basics, but the rest is up to you. Wrap your brain around the creation and assembly of the galaxy’s most (extra)ordinary items. Start with building a simple radio, then progress onto space drones and antimatter generators. A vast variety of devices await your creation.

AN ORIGINAL STORY A unique tale of friendship and redemption from the team behind award-winning games Thomas Was Alone and Subsurface Circular. Arcsmith is the first week at a new job unlike any you’ve experienced before.
